intro.Binary.name: payroll-main
intro.Binary.notes: This binary represents a sample Payroll application. It requires an environment-dependent reference to a repository location on the filesystem via the REPOSITORY_LOCATION placeholder.

intro.Connection.name: db-connection
intro.Connection.notes: This connection represents the database connection required by the Payroll application. It is identified by an alias known to the payroll-main application. Both username and password are set via a placeholder. Both minimum and maximum pool sizes are overridden.
